column4: i installed the auto package of the game armagetronad and for some reason its all screwed up, now my synaptic package manager doesn't work, how can i remove that package?
my name is AlexC_, not AlexC.
ugghh still says the same line ><
it appeared to have done it, but when i went to open the Synaptic Package Manager, the same error popped up ><
the same error as before? now try a sudo apt-get remove --purge <package>
damn it, the same error again... :(
sudo apt-get clean   sudo apt-get check
is there a way to force the program to be removed?
